December 5, 1956
Miss Blanche Crippen
Assistant Director, Public Information
Joint Council on Educational TV
1785 ASSACHUSETTS AVENUE, N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear >V i s$ Crippen*
We would like to contact the following three holders
OF TELEVISION CP*S. WOULD YOU PLEASE FURNISH US WITH
THE NAMES OF CONTACT PERSONS IF YOU HAVE THEM? SUCH
PERSONS WOULD PREFERABLY BE THE DIRECTORS IN CHARGE
OF THE TELEVISION PROJECTS. THE THREE ARE AS FOLLOWS 2
Department of Eoucation
State House
Trenton, New Jersey
Station WTLV, Mew Brunswick, New Jersey
Connecticut State Boaro of Education
State Office Building
Hartford, Connecticut
Stations WCTN, WCTB, ano WEDH
University of the State of New York
State Education Department
Albany, New York
Stations WRCH, WREG, WHTV, WIET, WTVF, WQTV, WTVZ
Thank vou for any help you can give us.
Sincerely,
cci Mrs. Dorothy Smith, ACE
Martha Kappmeyer
Traffic Manager
